text: @GovAbbott What are YOU doing about the surging numbers of #COVID19 cases in state?! What are you doing besides opening up further? Where are your whack-a-mole teams now? How many days above the health expert 6% daily infection rate before you take action? It would be nice to know plans. https://t.co/aXFAKYSz2D
